segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 44
segments.en: Linked Discourses 44

segments.pli: 1. Abyākatavagga
segments.en: 1. The Undeclared Points

segments.pli: 4. Dutiyasāriputtakoṭṭhikasutta
segments.en: 4. With Sāriputta and Koṭṭhita (2nd)

segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye … pe …
segments.en: At one time Venerable Sāriputta and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita were staying near Benares, in the deer park at Isipatana. …

segments.pli: (sāyeva pucchā.)
segments.en: (The same down as far as:)

segments.pli: “Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu, ko paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
segments.en: “What’s the cause, reverend, what’s the reason why this has not been declared by the Buddha?”

segments.pli: “Rūpaṃ kho, āvuso, ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpasamudayaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
segments.en: “Reverend, not truly knowing and seeing form, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation, one thinks ‘a Realized One exists after death’ or

segments.pli: ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
segments.en: ‘a Realized One doesn’t exist after death’ or

segments.pli: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
segments.en: ‘a Realized One both exists and doesn’t exist after death’ or

segments.pli: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti.
segments.en: ‘a Realized One neither exists nor doesn’t exist after death.’

segments.pli: Vedanaṃ … pe …
segments.en: Not truly knowing or seeing feeling …

segments.pli: saññaṃ … pe …
segments.en: perception …

segments.pli: saṅkhāre … pe …
segments.en: choices …

segments.pli: viññāṇaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇasamudayaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
segments.en: consciousness, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation, one thinks ‘a Realized One exists after death’ or

segments.pli: ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
segments.en: ‘a Realized One doesn’t exist after death’ or

segments.pli: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
segments.en: ‘a Realized One both exists and doesn’t exist after death’ or

segments.pli: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”tipissa hoti.
segments.en: ‘A Realized One neither exists nor doesn’t exist after death.’

segments.pli: Rūpañca kho, āvuso, jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpasamudayaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti … pe …
segments.en: Truly knowing and seeing form …

segments.pli: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
Vedanaṃ … pe …
segments.en: feeling …

segments.pli: saññaṃ … pe …
segments.en: perception …

segments.pli: saṅkhāre … pe …
segments.en: choices …

segments.pli: viññāṇaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇasamudayaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
segments.en: consciousness, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation, one doesn’t think ‘a Realized One exists after death’ or

segments.pli: ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
segments.en: ‘a Realized One doesn’t exist after death’ or

segments.pli: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
segments.en: ‘a Realized One both exists and doesn’t exist after death’ or

segments.pli: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
segments.en: ‘a Realized One neither exists nor doesn’t exist after death.’

segments.pli: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti.
segments.en: This is the cause, this is the reason why this has not been declared by the Buddha.”

segments.pli: Catutthaṃ.

sections.title: At one time Venerable Sāriputta and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita were…

suttaplex.blurb: Mahākoṭṭhita asks Sāriputta whether a Realized One exists after death. Sāriputta says that one who understands the five aggregates would not think in such terms.
